alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Hamilton; Lampasas; Mills (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 10:47PM CDT until June 23 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Hamilton County in central Texas... Northwestern Lampasas County in central Texas... Mills County in central Texas... Southeastern Comanche County in central Texas... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1047 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Goldthwaite, or 17 miles north of San Saba, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Goldthwaite, Gustine, Mullin, Lometa, Ridge, Democrat, Regency, Lamkin, Moline, Bozar, Priddy, Us-190 Near The San Saba- Lampasas County Line, Indian Gap, Newburg, Center City, Energy, Star, Pottsville, Gentrys Mill and Pecan Wells. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
